text: Johann Knahl (born 17 October 1914, date of death unknown) was a Czech alpine skier. He competed in the men's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Czech male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Czechoslovakia Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Johann Knahl
